samhwg wrote:

> It was deployed successfully 


Heritrix as a WAR relies on the container's auth.  Checkout its 
web.xml.   Setup a login in your container for user 'admin' with role 
'admin' however its done in your container (Usually a file named user 
and roles .properties strategically located).

But it looks like you're still missing jars going by the 
ClassNotFoundException in the below.  What are you trying to deploy?  
admin.war or heritrix.war (Should be the latter).

St.Ack

> and a login screen is available, but when
> I use admin/letmein to log in, the screen always stays in login screen
